content.contents:
the cover for my third single, 'loving embrace of angel's soft wings'.
i like this single. it was my first time trying out mixing what i like to call a 'hyper-edit', in which i take an audio file and chop it to shit. in this case, it was the main piano melody i'd written for the track. i took that melody, exported as a wav, dropped it back in and chopped it up. i still use this technique to this day. it's very fun. i love the cover. nichijou is a favorite of mine, and the simplicity of this cover i think reflects the sound of the track to which it's pertained quite well.
